name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **PHP**, **Go**, and **RESTful APIs**. Proven expertise in Domain Driven Design, Unit Testing, and Integration Testing to ensure robust application performance. Proficient in deploying scalable solutions on **AWS** and utilizing **AWS SQS** for efficient message queuing. Adept at crafting maintainable, secure back-end systems while adhering to best practices and compliance standards.

With a solid foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, I bring a comprehensive full-stack perspective to backend development. My hands-on experience in building cloud-native applications and leading the development of enterprise platforms has fostered a keen understanding of integrating AI/ML capabilities into backend systems for enhanced analytics and automation. Passionate about building systems that provide practical solutions while making a tangible impact in healthcare and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and developed robust server-side logic using **PHP** and **Go**, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from front-end applications and RESTful APIs.
• Implemented Domain Driven Design principles to structure code in a way that enhances maintainability, scalability, and team collaboration, especially for complex backend systems.
• Developed and documented unit tests and integration tests covering key functionalities using test frameworks, significantly increasing code reliability by achieving over **85%** code coverage.
• Deployed cloud services on **AWS**, leveraging **AWS SQS** for efficient message queuing and processing, supporting seamless integration between microservices and improving system responsiveness.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance existing backend features and optimize database queries, resulting in a performance improvement of up to **30%**.
• Conducted code reviews and mentored junior developers, fostering a culture of quality and continuous improvement in backend development practices.
• Maintained clear communication in **English** with stakeholders to ensure alignment with business requirements and timely delivery of backend solutions.

• Developed robust and scalable **RESTful APIs** using **PHP** and **Go** to enhance backend functionality for high-volume financial platforms.
• Applied **Domain Driven Design** principles to architect applications, improving code organization and maintainability, leading to a **30%** reduction in technical debt.
• Implemented comprehensive **Unit Testing** and **Integration Testing** strategies to ensure code quality and reliability, achieving over **90%** test coverage across critical services.
• Leveraged **AWS** services, including **AWS SQS** for message queuing, facilitating asynchronous task processing and enhancing system responsiveness.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features on time, resulting in a **25%** improvement in sprint completion rates.
• Mentored junior developers on best practices and technologies, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement within the team, which increased overall team satisfaction by **15%**.
• Created and maintained documentation for APIs and system architectures, ensuring clarity and understanding among team members and stakeholders.

Developed and optimized robust **PHP** and **Go** backend services for high-performance applications, employing **RESTful APIs** that adhere to **Domain Driven Design** principles to ensure scalable and maintainable architecture.
Designed rigorous **Unit Testing** and **Integration Testing** processes to validate backend functionalities, achieving a code coverage of **85%**, ensuring software reliability and performance.
Implemented message queuing solutions utilizing **AWS SQS** for decoupling services and enhancing application scalability, facilitating efficient message processing and delivery across diverse services.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to seamlessly integrate new features and services in the backend, resulting in a **30%** reduction in deployment time through enhanced CI/CD practices.
Maintained a focus on clear, effective **English** communication to document project progress, technical designs, and developer handoffs, ensuring stakeholder alignment and clarity in project execution.
Engaged in troubleshooting and debugging backend issues, decreasing incident response times by **40%** through active monitoring and performance optimization strategies.
